welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Fords, a charming city known for its historic landmarks and friendly community. We hope you enjoy your stay and explore all that our beautiful city has to offer!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Linden Airport serves all commercial flights and provides a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Linden Airport caters to private and chartered flights, offering exclusive services and facilities for passengers.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for various airlines.

wifi.note: Limited to 30 minutes per device per day. Premium WiFi available for purchase.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport houses all major airlines and provides a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Municipal Airport caters to private and chartered flights, offering exclusive services and amenities for their passengers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This is the main terminal where all domestic and international flights depart and arrive.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is reserved for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, free of charge.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at LaGuardia Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A newer terminal at LaGuardia Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: A terminal at LaGuardia Airport, primarily serving Delta Air Lines flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal mainly serves international airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal serves mainly Delta Air Lines and its partners.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: This terminal is the largest and busiest at JFK, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: This terminal serves JetBlue and its partners.

terminals.name: Terminal 7
terminals.description: This terminal serves mainly British Airways and its partners.

terminals.name: Terminal 8
terminals.description: This terminal serves mainly American Airlines and its partners.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may be limited in some areas.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Monmouth Executive Airport offers a variety of amenities for travelers, including a comfortable waiting area and a cafe serving hot and cold beverages.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: The private jet terminal at Monmouth Executive Airport provides luxurious and exclusive services for private jet travelers, including a VIP lounge and concierge services.

wifi.note: Complimentary wifi is available throughout the airport.
